Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
We are looking for an exceptional artificial intelligence engineer for our growing data engineering team. This position will play a crucial role in the development of new functions and ensure our technical lead. Future projects include: Improved customer targeting, better canvassing routes, deep training analysis and improvements.
Requirements/Qualifications:
2+ years working in A.I. or Machine Learning
Experienced working with a Data Science or Software Development team
Proficient in an Object Oriented language
Experience in Cloud technologies is a plus

Job Summary:
As a part of the Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) Algorithms team, the AI/ML Engineer will perform research and development of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning systems for use in clinical settings. It is a cutting-edge research and development opportunity with key focus on analyzing data to discover the relationships among various measurements and medically relevant conditions and developing computational models for diseases diagnosis, detection and prediction of critical events. Responsibilities will include working with data such as speech, image/video, electronic medical records as well as continuous streams from invasive and non-invasive sensors. The AI/ML Engineer will also closely work with our software, hardware and systems teams to ensure an efficient deployment in Masimo products.
Duties & Responsibilities:

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description: Svitla Systems Inc. is looking for a Senior Data Engineer (with Python, Scala, and AWS) for a full-time position (40 hours per week) in Turkey. Our client is a French premium television channel launched in 1984, and the channel broadcasts several kinds of programming, mostly encrypted. The client supports the Hybrid Broadcast Broadband TV (HbbTV) initiative, which promotes and establishes an open European standard for hybrid set-top boxes for viewing broadcast TV and broadband multimedia applications with a single user interface. The direction the Data Team wants to put at the heart of its DWH ecosystem solutions will allow it to meet these scalabilities, data sharing, and performance needs. The mission consists of migrating existing projects and building the standards and processes for new ones. The data engineers will join a team of 10 experts but will most likely begin the creation of a new sub-team in the Data department. To infuse the “data culture,” a decree is not enough. Therefore the client’s projects combine strategy and innovative solutions with essential relationships with the business teams. Agile teams: daily meetings, sprint planning, POC, code review, and open source are routine. A cutting-edge stack and platforms support live streaming with nearly a million simultaneous connections. Tech Stack: Python, Scala, AWS, AWS Lambda Python/Scala, AWS batch Python/Scala, AWS API Python/Scala, Git (CI/CD), Terraform, Airflow 2, Docker.

Description:
The international technology company Ajax Systems opens a full-cycle production facility in Turkey for 400 employees.
Ajax Systems is the largest developer and manufacturer of security systems in Europe. The back office, R&D department, and two full-cycle production facilities are located in Ukraine. The company has branch offices worldwide: UAE (Dubai), Italy, Spain, Germany, Poland, Canada, and many other regions. Ajax team has more than 2,200 employees, including 500 developers and 1,200 production workers. Attracting local expertise in each key market enables us to scale the product globally and grow fast.

We invite HSE Engineer to join our team and oversee all the production processes in line with the company’s quality standards. This position is a key strategic role in the company contributing to sustaining and growing business to achieve long-term success at Ajax.

Location: Istanbul, Tuzla, DESBAS

Description
General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Responsibilities:Driving the PQ system analysis within the scope of PQ approach, preparing analysis report and plays a role in identifying customer problems. Evaluating opportunities regarding reports, observation & troubleshooting, supports Sales Team strategies. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Collaborates with the Supply Chain function (Feeder Factors) to ensure that technical requirements for equipment or services are communicated and agreed on with potential suppliers. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Kick-off meeting with the customer, having the knowledge and experience to manage the after-sales projects Execute Service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Hitachi Energy standard processes, quality standards and safety guidelines. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. In close co-operation with customer and other Hitachi Energy teams, take actions to identify new Service business opportunities for Hitachi Energy. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

General information: We seek for "R&D Electrical Engineer" who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy in Power Grids, Transformer Components and Service in Tuzla location in Istanbul with below qualifications. As part of our global R&D community including Technology Centers and Research Centers worldwide, you will contribute to improve the performance of our products in the various factories belonging to the Transformer Components and Services Business. You will focus on developing and optimize materials and processes and drive innovation applied to transformer components. As a member of the highly skilled Technology Center team, you will contribute to the roadmap execution in a professional way.
Responsibilities: Make electrical design using the necessary tools and programs by demonstrating advanced knowledge of principles and practices in related practice areas. Experience in CAD environment design, especially E3 is a plus. Experience with PLM software, especially Windchill platform, is preferred. To have experience and knowledge in industrial equipment design. Having knowledge and experience in the design of transformer components is preferred. Creating BOMs on the ERP program. SAP knowledge is preferred. Provide cost effective quality solutions per customer requirements and deliver within budget and contract; solve unique problems by applying technical knowledge. Make technical judgment in unique problems considering multiple aspects. Find creative/innovative ways to tailor complex solutions to business and customer needs. Proactively exchange relevant information with sources within and beyond own area to increase efficiency, share relevant information with selected sources to ensure better results. Share technical knowledge with colleagues via various channels, including forums, training and coaching. Be aware of HSE aspects and ensure compliance with applicable standards and regulations.
Your background: BS or MS degree in Electrical Engineering or Mechatronics Engineering. MS degree will be preferred. More than 3 years of relevant work experience in large organization is considered a plus. Working experience according to international standards (DIN, IEC, IEEE, EN, etc.). Knowledge on CAD software - E3 is considered an advantage. Knowledge about occupational health and safety, environment and quality management systems. Have knowledge about process improvement and operational excellence. Having a Lean 6 Sigma Green belt is preferable. Knowledge of project management methodologies. Having a certificate in project management is preferred. Very good communication skills in English and Turkish in oral and written form. Ability to speak with and work together with the technical teams in different parts of the world. Experience on Microsoft Office tools. Be eligible to Work in Multinational and Diversity. Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
Analog Devices (NASDAQ: ADI) designs and manufactures semiconductor products and solutions. We enable our customers to interpret the world around us by intelligently bridging the physical and digital worlds with unmatched technologies that sense, measure and connect.
At Analog Devices Automotive Cabin Experience Istanbul Design Center, you will be able to work together with a global team, who has designed and introduced many successful products that won sockets from top car makers in Europe, Asia, and the USA. We, as GMSL SerDes group, are developing integrated circuits for automotive high-speed serial data communications for next generation safety and infotainment systems.
As an analog design engineer, you will be part of a global design team, and have opportunity to work with cross functional teams to design complex mixed-signal integrated circuits developed in GMSL SerDes group. You will generate creative solutions for a variety of needs such as high resolution, high accuracy, low power, low current, and high speed. You will be designing mixed-signal circuits containing high-speed transceivers, high-performance PLL's, Clock and Data Recovery Circuits, application specific amplifiers, and many others.

We create smart innovations to meet the mobility challenges of today and tomorrow. Joining us means joining a truly global community of more than 70000 people dedicated to solving real-world mobility challenges and achieving international projects with sustainable local impact.

Job_title: Golang System Software Engineer - Containers / Virtualisation
Description:
We are hiring a Golang software engineer to work on the low level Go codebase sitting between our REST API and the low level C libraries used to manage containers and virtual machines. We are looking for system-level developers with experience in design and data management/modeling.
The LXD team is responsible for the design, development and evolution of LXD, a modern system container and virtual machine manager that is widely used on Ubuntu, ChromeOS and other Linux platforms. LXD components span the entire software stack from low-level kernel features to the upper level management REST API and CLI.
This is an opportunity for someone who wants to have a meaningful impact on modern cloud computing technologies. Canonical offers a fun, fast-paced team environment and a career full of learning and development.

Description:
We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our IT team in order to help us expanding and optimizing our data and data pipeline architecture, support data needs of the stakeholders, and work collaboratively with software engineers and business analysts.
The ideal candidate is an experienced engineer who is passionate about working with huge data, who enjoys optimizing data systems and building them from the ground up. The job description includes designing, building and managing data systems and databases. The Data Engineer will support our software developers, database architects, data analysts and data scientists on data initiatives and will ensure optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects. He/she must be self-directed and comfortable supporting the data needs of multiple teams, systems and products. The right candidate will be excited by the prospect of optimizing or even re-designing our company’s data architecture to support our next generation of products and data initiatives.

Description:
Introduction
Technology sales at IBM is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. Preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', Client Engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges.


As a Cloud Engineer (what we in IBM call a 'Technology Engineer') within Client Engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of Architects, Data Scientists, Designers, Developers, and Business Strategists. The brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. The outputs of which produce minimal viable product (MVP), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed.




Excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. Our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. Always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support MVPs and proofs of concept (PoC) that compel clients to invest in IBM's products and services.

We create smart innovations to meet the mobility challenges of today and tomorrow. This position's main tasks is to design, implement, test for application activity for integrated central control system projects (automation real time project ). Knowledge of the operation and configuration of Microsoft Windows OS(W. server) is necessary. Coding experience and knowledge of TCP/IP networks is desirable. Also, a know-how of railway Signalling principles, techniques and associated products (Interlocking, Traffic Management System, Safety, Quality etc.), as also experience in this field, is an advantage.

Job_title: Golang System Software Engineer - Containers / Virtualisation
Description:
We are hiring a Golang software engineer to work on the low level Go codebase sitting between our REST API and the low level C libraries used to manage containers and virtual machines. We are looking for system-level developers with experience in design and data management/modeling.
The LXD team is responsible for the design, development and evolution of LXD, a modern system container and virtual machine manager that is widely used on Ubuntu, ChromeOS and other Linux platforms. LXD components span the entire software stack from low-level kernel features to the upper level management REST API and CLI.
This is an opportunity for someone who wants to have a meaningful impact on modern cloud computing technologies. Canonical offers a fun, fast-paced team environment and a career full of learning and development.

Job_title: Senior Software Engineer – CargoWise Customs, Turkey
Description:
Autonomy, Mastery and Purpose. Our mission is to deliver breakthrough products that enable and empower those that own and operate the supply chains of the world. Our vision and mission drive everything that we do and are at the core of our strategy. Our people sit at the centre of all of this.
WiseTech Global provides the world’s most comprehensive solution for companies operating in the increasingly complex world of logistics. It has never been a more important time for organisations to have a resilient supply chain. Our industry-leading flagship product, CargoWise, is centralising logistics operations on a single global database, delivering business continuity, scalability and security.
At the very core of this is our CargoWise Native Customs functionality. This platform accounts for over 45% of global manufactured trade flows, a number that is growing year on year. The work you do in this team has a genuine, meaningful real world impact. So if you are an ambitious engineer, who wants to solve deeply complex problems with others of a similar mindset, read on.

Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Job Summary:
As a part of the Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) Algorithms team, the AI/ML Engineer will perform research and development of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning systems for use in clinical settings. It is a cutting-edge research and development opportunity with key focus on analyzing data to discover the relationships among various measurements and medically relevant conditions and developing computational models for diseases diagnosis, detection and prediction of critical events. Responsibilities will include working with data such as speech, image/video, electronic medical records as well as continuous streams from invasive and non-invasive sensors. The AI/ML Engineer will also closely work with our software, hardware and systems teams to ensure an efficient deployment in Masimo products.

Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Job Summary:
As a part of the Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) Algorithms team, the AI/ML Engineer will perform research and development of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning systems for use in clinical settings. It is a cutting-edge research and development opportunity with key focus on analyzing data to discover the relationships among various measurements and medically relevant conditions and developing computational models for diseases diagnosis, detection and prediction of critical events. Responsibilities will include working with data such as speech, image/video, electronic medical records as well as continuous streams from invasive and non-invasive sensors. The AI/ML Engineer will also closely work with our software, hardware and systems teams to ensure an efficient deployment in Masimo products.

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Job Summary:
As a part of the Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) Algorithms team, the AI/ML Engineer will perform research and development of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning systems for use in clinical settings. It is a cutting-edge research and development opportunity with key focus on analyzing data to discover the relationships among various measurements and medically relevant conditions and developing computational models for diseases diagnosis, detection and prediction of critical events. Responsibilities will include working with data such as speech, image/video, electronic medical records as well as continuous streams from invasive and non-invasive sensors. The AI/ML Engineer will also closely work with our software, hardware and systems teams to ensure an efficient deployment in Masimo products.

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Job Summary:
As a part of the Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) Algorithms team, the AI/ML Engineer will perform research and development of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning systems for use in clinical settings. It is a cutting-edge research and development opportunity with key focus on analyzing data to discover the relationships among various measurements and medically relevant conditions and developing computational models for diseases diagnosis, detection and prediction of critical events. Responsibilities will include working with data such as speech, image/video, electronic medical records as well as continuous streams from invasive and non-invasive sensors. The AI/ML Engineer will also closely work with our software, hardware and systems teams to ensure an efficient deployment in Masimo products.

Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Company_name: Hitachi Energy Turkey Elektrik Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
Description:
Description
General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Responsibilities:Driving the PQ system analysis within the scope of PQ approach, preparing analysis report and plays a role in identifying customer problems. Evaluating opportunities regarding reports, observation & troubleshooting, supports Sales Team strategies. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Collaborates with the Supply Chain function (Feeder Factors) to ensure that technical requirements for equipment or services are communicated and agreed on with potential suppliers. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Kick-off meeting with the customer, having the knowledge and experience to manage the after-sales projects Execute Service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Hitachi Energy standard processes, quality standards and safety guidelines. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. In close co-operation with customer and other Hitachi Energy teams, take actions to identify new Service business opportunities for Hitachi Energy. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Vitelco İstanbul, Türkiye (Hybrid)

Vitelco provides IT services on CRM, Billing, Middleware, Mobile VAS, Business Intelligence and Big Data applications in Finance and Telecom sector since 2014. Our team have years of experience in managing and working with many global and national projects. Vitelco offers comprehensive services to customers with principle of “Versatile” and “Innovative”.
We’re looking for Software Test Engineers who can join our project!
QUALIFICATIONS
Graduated from Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or related departments,
At least 2 years of experience as a Software Test Engineer,
Experience of CI/CD, DevOps, Application Administration is a plus,
Hands on experience and knowledge about front-end/back-end testing and SDLC,
Expertise in tools and languages like Load Runner, Jenkins, Selenium/Appium/UFT, SQL, SOAP UI, Postman, Xray and Jira,
Running tests, analyzing the results and reporting,
Writing detailed test cases and acceptance criteria that can be used in manual or automated testing for testing teams,
Identify, analyze, and document any defects discovered during testing and provide fine tuning recommendations,



Execution of manual and automation tests on IT systems,
Reporting of test results and opening of defects,
Preparing test cases and scenarios,
Preparing test data,

Job Summary:
As a part of the Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) Algorithms team, the AI/ML Engineer will perform research and development of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning systems for use in clinical settings. It is a cutting-edge research and development opportunity with key focus on analyzing data to discover the relationships among various measurements and medically relevant conditions and developing computational models for diseases diagnosis, detection and prediction of critical events. Responsibilities will include working with data such as speech, image/video, electronic medical records as well as continuous streams from invasive and non-invasive sensors. The AI/ML Engineer will also closely work with our software, hardware and systems teams to ensure an efficient deployment in Masimo products.

Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Job Summary:
As a part of the Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) Algorithms team, the AI/ML Engineer will perform research and development of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning systems for use in clinical settings. It is a cutting-edge research and development opportunity with key focus on analyzing data to discover the relationships among various measurements and medically relevant conditions and developing computational models for diseases diagnosis, detection and prediction of critical events. Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
At Midas, we exchange ideas, complement our skills, and share experiences. In this way, everyone contributes to an atmosphere in which we challenge ourselves, and come up with new ideas and visions grow. We are a team shaping the future of trading in Turkey and growing rapidly. As Turkey's first zero-commission stock trading platform, we are looking for Senior Software Engineers who will join our talented engineering team that works on mission-critical applications.

As a Senior Software Engineer, your responsibilities will include:

Designing and developing high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems and delivering high availability and performance

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description
General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Responsibilities:Driving the PQ system analysis within the scope of PQ approach, preparing analysis report and plays a role in identifying customer problems. Evaluating opportunities regarding reports, observation & troubleshooting, supports Sales Team strategies. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Collaborates with the Supply Chain function (Feeder Factors) to ensure that technical requirements for equipment or services are communicated and agreed on with potential suppliers. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Kick-off meeting with the customer, having the knowledge and experience to manage the after-sales projects Execute Service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Hitachi Energy standard processes, quality standards and safety guidelines. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. In close co-operation with customer and other Hitachi Energy teams, take actions to identify new Service business opportunities for Hitachi Energy. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Job_title: Data Analysis / Data Engineering / Data Science (m/f/d)
Description:
Qimia is an internationally positioned company with a start-up mentality for digital transformation. We comprehensively support companies in their digitalization through innovative and excellent software & solutions, Big Data (& AI), Cloud Computing, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.
Our mission is to develop technologies of the future. With these, we are changing the way people use, interact with, explore and gain insights from data.
Are you an advocate of cutting-edge technologies, do you enjoy working in an agile and innovative environment, and keep up with the ever-evolving technical landscape? Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description
General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Responsibilities:Driving the PQ system analysis within the scope of PQ approach, preparing analysis report and plays a role in identifying customer problems. Evaluating opportunities regarding reports, observation & troubleshooting, supports Sales Team strategies. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Collaborates with the Supply Chain function (Feeder Factors) to ensure that technical requirements for equipment or services are communicated and agreed on with potential suppliers. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Kick-off meeting with the customer, having the knowledge and experience to manage the after-sales projects Execute Service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Hitachi Energy standard processes, quality standards and safety guidelines. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. In close co-operation with customer and other Hitachi Energy teams, take actions to identify new Service business opportunities for Hitachi Energy. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Designing and developing high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems and delivering high availability and performance

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Designing and developing high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems and delivering high availability and performance

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.
