Description
General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Responsibilities:Driving the PQ system analysis within the scope of PQ approach, preparing analysis report and plays a role in identifying customer problems. Evaluating opportunities regarding reports, observation & troubleshooting, supports Sales Team strategies. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Collaborates with the Supply Chain function (Feeder Factors) to ensure that technical requirements for equipment or services are communicated and agreed on with potential suppliers. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Kick-off meeting with the customer, having the knowledge and experience to manage the after-sales projects Execute Service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Hitachi Energy standard processes, quality standards and safety guidelines. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. In close co-operation with customer and other Hitachi Energy teams, take actions to identify new Service business opportunities for Hitachi Energy. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Vitelco İstanbul, Türkiye (Hybrid)

Vitelco provides IT services on CRM, Billing, Middleware, Mobile VAS, Business Intelligence and Big Data applications in Finance and Telecom sector since 2014. Our team have years of experience in managing and working with many global and national projects. Vitelco offers comprehensive services to customers with principle of “Versatile” and “Innovative”.
We’re looking for Software Test Engineers who can join our project!
QUALIFICATIONS
Graduated from Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or related departments,
At least 2 years of experience as a Software Test Engineer,
Experience of CI/CD, DevOps, Application Administration is a plus,
Hands on experience and knowledge about front-end/back-end testing and SDLC,
Expertise in tools and languages like Load Runner, Jenkins, Selenium/Appium/UFT, SQL, SOAP UI, Postman, Xray and Jira,
Running tests, analyzing the results and reporting,
Writing detailed test cases and acceptance criteria that can be used in manual or automated testing for testing teams,
Identify, analyze, and document any defects discovered during testing and provide fine tuning recommendations,



Execution of manual and automation tests on IT systems,
Reporting of test results and opening of defects,
Preparing test cases and scenarios,
Preparing test data,

GENEL NİTELİKLER VE İŞ TANIMI
Vitelco Bilişim Hizmetleri, finans ve telekom sektöründe CRM, Middleware, Billing, Mobil VAS, İş Zekası ve Cloud uygulamalarında uçtan uca IT hizmetleri sağlamaktadır. Vitelco, Deneyimli kadrosu ile Ulusal ve uluslararası büyük projelerde “Çok Yönlü” ve “Yenilikçi” ilkesiyle hizmetlerini sunmaktadır.
Uluslararası projelerimizde görev alacak yeni ekip arkadaşlarını takımımıza dahil ediyoruz!

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
At Midas, we exchange ideas, complement our skills, and share experiences. In this way, everyone contributes to an atmosphere in which we challenge ourselves, and come up with new ideas and visions grow. We are a team shaping the future of trading in Turkey and growing rapidly. As Turkey's first zero-commission stock trading platform, we are looking for Senior Software Engineers who will join our talented engineering team that works on mission-critical applications.

As a Senior Software Engineer, your responsibilities will include:

Designing and developing high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems and delivering high availability and performance

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Description
General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Responsibilities:Driving the PQ system analysis within the scope of PQ approach, preparing analysis report and plays a role in identifying customer problems. Evaluating opportunities regarding reports, observation & troubleshooting, supports Sales Team strategies. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Collaborates with the Supply Chain function (Feeder Factors) to ensure that technical requirements for equipment or services are communicated and agreed on with potential suppliers. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Kick-off meeting with the customer, having the knowledge and experience to manage the after-sales projects Execute Service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Hitachi Energy standard processes, quality standards and safety guidelines. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. In close co-operation with customer and other Hitachi Energy teams, take actions to identify new Service business opportunities for Hitachi Energy. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Description:
Vitelco İstanbul, Türkiye (Hybrid)

Vitelco provides IT services on CRM, Billing, Middleware, Mobile VAS, Business Intelligence and Big Data applications in Finance and Telecom sector since 2014. Our team have years of experience in managing and working with many global and national projects. Vitelco offers comprehensive services to customers with principle of “Versatile” and “Innovative”.
We’re looking for Software Test Engineers who can join our project!
QUALIFICATIONS
Graduated from Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or related departments,
At least 2 years of experience as a Software Test Engineer,
Experience of CI/CD, DevOps, Application Administration is a plus,
Hands on experience and knowledge about front-end/back-end testing and SDLC,
Expertise in tools and languages like Load Runner, Jenkins, Selenium/Appium/UFT, SQL, SOAP UI, Postman, Xray and Jira,
Running tests, analyzing the results and reporting,
Writing detailed test cases and acceptance criteria that can be used in manual or automated testing for testing teams,
Identify, analyze, and document any defects discovered during testing and provide fine tuning recommendations,



Execution of manual and automation tests on IT systems,
Reporting of test results and opening of defects,
Preparing test cases and scenarios,
Preparing test data,

GENEL NİTELİKLER VE İŞ TANIMI
Vitelco Bilişim Hizmetleri, finans ve telekom sektöründe CRM, Middleware, Billing, Mobil VAS, İş Zekası ve Cloud uygulamalarında uçtan uca IT hizmetleri sağlamaktadır. Vitelco, Deneyimli kadrosu ile Ulusal ve uluslararası büyük projelerde “Çok Yönlü” ve “Yenilikçi” ilkesiyle hizmetlerini sunmaktadır.
Uluslararası projelerimizde görev alacak yeni ekip arkadaşlarını takımımıza dahil ediyoruz!

5+ yıllık tecrübeli
Python dilinde hands-on development yapıyor olmak
En az bir Big Data projesi tamamlamış olmak

TensorFlow/Pandas/Numpy/Scikit-learn teknolojilerini aktif en az bir projede kullanmış olmak
Classification ve Regression metodlarında bilgi sahibi olmak

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Description
General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Responsibilities:Driving the PQ system analysis within the scope of PQ approach, preparing analysis report and plays a role in identifying customer problems. Evaluating opportunities regarding reports, observation & troubleshooting, supports Sales Team strategies. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Collaborates with the Supply Chain function (Feeder Factors) to ensure that technical requirements for equipment or services are communicated and agreed on with potential suppliers. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Kick-off meeting with the customer, having the knowledge and experience to manage the after-sales projects Execute Service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Hitachi Energy standard processes, quality standards and safety guidelines. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. In close co-operation with customer and other Hitachi Energy teams, take actions to identify new Service business opportunities for Hitachi Energy. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Vitelco İstanbul, Türkiye (Hybrid)

Vitelco provides IT services on CRM, Billing, Middleware, Mobile VAS, Business Intelligence and Big Data applications in Finance and Telecom sector since 2014. Our team have years of experience in managing and working with many global and national projects. Vitelco offers comprehensive services to customers with principle of “Versatile” and “Innovative”.
We’re looking for Software Test Engineers who can join our project!
QUALIFICATIONS
Graduated from Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or related departments,
At least 2 years of experience as a Software Test Engineer,
Experience of CI/CD, DevOps, Application Administration is a plus,
Hands on experience and knowledge about front-end/back-end testing and SDLC,
Expertise in tools and languages like Load Runner, Jenkins, Selenium/Appium/UFT, SQL, SOAP UI, Postman, Xray and Jira,
Running tests, analyzing the results and reporting,
Writing detailed test cases and acceptance criteria that can be used in manual or automated testing for testing teams,
Identify, analyze, and document any defects discovered during testing and provide fine tuning recommendations,



Execution of manual and automation tests on IT systems,
Reporting of test results and opening of defects,
Preparing test cases and scenarios,
Preparing test data,

Company_name: Hitachi Energy Turkey Elektrik Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
Description:
Description
General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Responsibilities:Driving the PQ system analysis within the scope of PQ approach, preparing analysis report and plays a role in identifying customer problems. Evaluating opportunities regarding reports, observation & troubleshooting, supports Sales Team strategies. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Collaborates with the Supply Chain function (Feeder Factors) to ensure that technical requirements for equipment or services are communicated and agreed on with potential suppliers. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Kick-off meeting with the customer, having the knowledge and experience to manage the after-sales projects Execute Service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Hitachi Energy standard processes, quality standards and safety guidelines. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. In close co-operation with customer and other Hitachi Energy teams, take actions to identify new Service business opportunities for Hitachi Energy. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Your tasks
We are looking for an 'Operations Engineer' who will examine the process flows in the relevant operation and make suggestions for the detection and improvement of process errors, support the pre-feasibility studies in the new project, follow the whole process, prepare reports, monitor the integration and implementation of the relevant business project.
Analyzing data / process flows to oversee process improvement initiatives through process changes.
Leading optimization projects for lean production and continuous improvement projects.
Facilitating system integration/improvement projects.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

We’re looking for Software Test Engineers who can join our project!
QUALIFICATIONS
Graduated from Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or related departments,
At least 2 years of experience as a Software Test Engineer,
Experience of CI/CD, DevOps, Application Administration is a plus,
Hands on experience and knowledge about front-end/back-end testing and SDLC,

Preparing test cases and scenarios,
Preparing test data,

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Description
General information:We seek for ''Service Engineer'' who will be able to demonstrate knowledge in Hitachi Energy Power Quality Service Solutions with below qualifications: Reporting to the PQ Operation Manager, you will act as the technical point person between customers and extended Hitachi Energy teams. Responsibilities:Driving the PQ system analysis within the scope of PQ approach, preparing analysis report and plays a role in identifying customer problems. Evaluating opportunities regarding reports, observation & troubleshooting, supports Sales Team strategies. Determining the appropriate equipment for the appropriate solution with the knowledge of the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Product Portfolio (Active Filters, LV&MV MECB Capacitor Banks, MV Open Rack Capacitor Bank) Be responsible for Engineering, Commissioning, Maintenance and start-up of PQ systems (Active Filters, Statcon, LV&MV Capacitor Banks) Have a high level and up to date technical know-how of Power Quality technologies, solutions and architectures Perform following engineering activities on the projects: Design, installation, implementation and documentation of PQ systems Preparation of engineering documents (general drawings, single line diagram, bill of materials, panel design drawings, etc.) Ensure that activities related to all engineering disciplines within the project are efficiently and cost-effectively executed in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements. Evaluates, selects and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments. Supports Operation Manager in issuing claims (new/change in scope of work, cost impact, time impact, risk quantifications, etc.). Provides quality solutions as per customer requirements and delivers within budget and contract. Ensures adherence to safety standards and mitigation of potential risks. Collaborates with the Supply Chain function (Feeder Factors) to ensure that technical requirements for equipment or services are communicated and agreed on with potential suppliers. Provides technical evaluation of supplier proposals and accepts as fit for purpose supplied equipment or services. Kick-off meeting with the customer, having the knowledge and experience to manage the after-sales projects Execute Service work with low to medium complexity according to work instructions and in accordance with Hitachi Energy standard processes, quality standards and safety guidelines. Deliver quality customer service to satisfy customers. In close co-operation with customer and other Hitachi Energy teams, take actions to identify new Service business opportunities for Hitachi Energy. Contributes to customer satisfaction by executing Service work according to customer order and expectation. Maintains a good relationship with customers. Identifies new sales opportunities and communicates them internally. Prepares all documents and reports to be signed by the customer representative. Reports work done in a timely manner and according to HSE requirements and follows up when needed. Provides recommendations to management to improve operations and customer service. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your background:University Degree, in Electrical Engineering 5-10 years of experience, preferably in Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business service ,reporting and project management. Having knowledge and experience about system measurement & analysis, diagnostic & troubleshooting features in the Power Quality Solutions (PQS) Business. Knowledge on International standards (i.e., IEEE/IEC) Fluent in English and Turkish. Being self-motivated and self-organized. Open mindedness and strong interpersonal skills. No restriction for intensive travelling (both domestic & abroad). Having a valid driving license. Completed military service for male applicants

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.

Description:
At Midas, we exchange ideas, complement our skills, and share experiences. In this way, everyone contributes to an atmosphere in which we challenge ourselves, and come up with new ideas and visions grow. We are a team shaping the future of trading in Turkey and growing rapidly. As Turkey's first zero-commission stock trading platform, we are looking for Senior Software Engineers who will join our talented engineering team that works on mission-critical applications.

As a Senior Software Engineer, your responsibilities will include:

Designing and developing high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems and delivering high availability and performance

About ClubPay
Qlub is a Global FinTech Startup revolutionising payments in restaurants and cafes by letting customers pay straight from a QR code! As a Qlub user you still get to enjoy the full dine-in experience, but now you have the choice to pay and split bills in a matter of seconds all via your mobile, instead of waiting for the cheque! After successfully launching in Dubai, Japan, Australia and Singapore, and raising an additional $17 million in funding, we have recently launched Qlub in Turkey as well.
About the Team
Data Team plays a key role in driving the business of ClubPay. Gathering data from each part of the company, integrating different kinds of information into a well-designed data lake, and also analyzing data and providing management dashboards and KPI metrics are among the daily tasks of the team. To achieve this mission, not only cooperation to other team members including data scientists, DevOps engineers, Infrastructure experts is a must, but also collaboration to other teams in ClubPay is inevitable and it’s the exactly point that made the team as dynamic and active as possible.

Description:
Vitelco İstanbul, Türkiye (Hybrid)

Vitelco provides IT services on CRM, Billing, Middleware, Mobile VAS, Business Intelligence and Big Data applications in Finance and Telecom sector since 2014. Our team have years of experience in managing and working with many global and national projects. Vitelco offers comprehensive services to customers with principle of “Versatile” and “Innovative”.
We’re looking for Software Test Engineers who can join our project!
QUALIFICATIONS
Graduated from Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or related departments,
At least 2 years of experience as a Software Test Engineer,
Experience of CI/CD, DevOps, Application Administration is a plus,
Hands on experience and knowledge about front-end/back-end testing and SDLC,
Expertise in tools and languages like Load Runner, Jenkins, Selenium/Appium/UFT, SQL, SOAP UI, Postman, Xray and Jira,
Running tests, analyzing the results and reporting,
Writing detailed test cases and acceptance criteria that can be used in manual or automated testing for testing teams,
Identify, analyze, and document any defects discovered during testing and provide fine tuning recommendations,



Execution of manual and automation tests on IT systems,
Reporting of test results and opening of defects,
Preparing test cases and scenarios,
Preparing test data,

GENEL NİTELİKLER VE İŞ TANIMI
Vitelco Bilişim Hizmetleri, finans ve telekom sektöründe CRM, Middleware, Billing, Mobil VAS, İş Zekası ve Cloud uygulamalarında uçtan uca IT hizmetleri sağlamaktadır. Vitelco, Deneyimli kadrosu ile Ulusal ve uluslararası büyük projelerde “Çok Yönlü” ve “Yenilikçi” ilkesiyle hizmetlerini sunmaktadır.
Uluslararası projelerimizde görev alacak yeni ekip arkadaşlarını takımımıza dahil ediyoruz!

Uygun adayın aşağıdaki yetkinliklerde olması beklenmektedir:
5+ yıllık tecrübeli
Python dilinde hands-on development yapıyor olmak
En az bir Big Data projesi tamamlamış olmak
Hadoop/HDFS/HBase/Apache Hive/Apache Pig konusunda bilgi sahibi olmak
Cassandra/Mongo DB konusunda bilgi sahibi olmak
Kafka/RabbitMQ konusunda bilgi sahibi olmak
Redis/Memcache/Ignite konusunda bilgi sahibi olmak
Flink/Spark konusunda bilgi sahibi olmak
TensorFlow/Pandas/Numpy/Scikit-learn teknolojilerini aktif en az bir projede kullanmış olmak
Classification ve Regression metodlarında bilgi sahibi olmak

Description:
About Picus
Picus Security Inc is a place where exceptional people gather to do their best work. We convert new ideas to exceptional solutions and great customer experiences. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Join Picus to become part of our talented team!

Picus Security pioneered Breach and Attack Simulation (BAS) technology in 2013, recognized as a Cool Vendor in Security and Risk Management by Gartner in 2019 and a leading vendor in BAS Market by Frost & Sullivan in 2022. Picus is a Series-B startup supported by reputable private equity and venture capital organizations including Mastercard, Turkven, Earlybird Capital, ACT and Endeavor Catalyst.

Picus Security’s complete security validation platform helps CISOs and security teams gain visibility over their security posture by continuously validating their security controls and their SIEM/SOC tools, and remediating any potential exposure rapidly with the help of Breach and Attack Simulation technology.

Description:
Obilet.com, an online ticketing, car rental, and hotel reservation platform, was founded in 2012.

In addition to B2C services for online bus-plane-ferry tickets, car rental, and hotel reservations, Obilet also provides its B2B business partners with the services of route data distribution (GDS) and ticketing infrastructure software (IMS). Obilet is the market leader in Turkey in both B2B and B2C segments with more than 400 bus companies using its IMS software, 30 million monthly visitors, and 12 million mobile app downloads.

Having the most visited website in the world among bus ticketing platforms, Obilet aims to achieve 40 million ticket sales in 2023 and to be the one-stop-shop for whole needs of users regarding tourism and travel products. Obilet further aims to become a global brand by launching an international expansion project in 2023.
